com.wookler.zconfig.common

Class ConfigurationAnnotationProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wookler.zconfig.common.ConfigurationAnnotationProcessor

  • public class ConfigurationAnnotationProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to auto-apply configuration values to annotated types.

        Parameters:
        type - - Type of the target object.
        config - - Configuration source.
